00055 namespace {
00056   const char *usage[] = {
00057     "usage: Hypertable.RangeServer [OPTIONS]",
00058     "",
00059     "OPTIONS:",
00060     "  --config=<file>      Read configuration from <file>.  The default config file is",
00061     "                       \"conf/hypertable.cfg\" relative to the toplevel install directory",
00062     "  --help               Display this help text and exit",
00063     "  --log-broker=<addr>  Use the DFS broker located at <addr> for the commit log.",
00064     "                       <addr> is of the format <host>:<port>",
00065     "  --pidfile=<fname>    Write the process ID to <fname> upon successful startup",
00066     "  --verbose,-v         Generate verbose output",
00067     ""
00068     "This program is the Hypertable range server.",
00069     (const char *)0
00070   };
00071   const int DEFAULT_WORKERS = 20;
00072 }
00073 
00074 
00078 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00079   {
00080     ConnectionManagerPtr conn_manager_ptr;
00081     ApplicationQueuePtr app_queue_ptr;
00082     string cfgfile = "";
00083     string pidfile = "";
00084     int reactor_count;
00085     char *logbroker = 0;
00086     PropertiesPtr props_ptr;
00087     int worker_count;
00088     TimerHandlerPtr timer_handler_ptr;
00089 
00090     try {
00091 
00092       System::initialize(System::locate_install_dir(argv[0]));
00093       Global::verbose = false;
00094 
00095       if (argc > 1) {
00096         for (int i=1; i<argc; i++) {
00097           if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--config=", 9))
00098             cfgfile = &argv[i][9];
00099           else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--log-broker=", 13))
00100             logbroker = &argv[i][13];
00101           else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--pidfile=", 10))
00102             pidfile = &argv[i][10];
00103           else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--verbose") || !strcmp(argv[i], "-v"))
00104             Global::verbose = true;
00105           else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--crash-test=", 13)) {
00106             if (Global::crash_test == 0)
00107               Global::crash_test = new CrashTest();
00108             Global::crash_test->parse_option(&argv[i][13]);
00109           }
00110           else
00111             Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00112         }
00113       }
00114 
00115       if (cfgfile == "")
00116         cfgfile = System::install_dir + "/conf/hypertable.cfg";
00117 
00118       props_ptr = new Properties(cfgfile);
00119       if (Global::verbose)
00120         props_ptr->set("Hypertable.Verbose", "true");
00121 
00122       if (logbroker != 0) {
00123         char *portstr = strchr(logbroker, ':');
00124         if (portstr == 0) {
00125           HT_ERROR("Invalid address format for --log-broker, must be <host>:<port>");
00126           exit(1);
00127         }
00128         *portstr++ = 0;
00129         props_ptr->set("Hypertable.RangeServer.CommitLog.DfsBroker.Host", logbroker);
00130         props_ptr->set("Hypertable.RangeServer.CommitLog.DfsBroker.Port", portstr);
00131       }
00132 
00133       reactor_count = props_ptr->get_int("Hypertable.RangeServer.Reactors", System::get_processor_count());
00134       ReactorFactory::initialize(reactor_count);
00135       Comm *comm = Comm::instance();
00136 
00137       worker_count = props_ptr->get_int("Hypertable.RangeServer.Workers", DEFAULT_WORKERS);
00138 
00139       conn_manager_ptr = new ConnectionManager(comm);
00140       app_queue_ptr = new ApplicationQueue(worker_count);
00141 
00145       Global::hyperspace_ptr = new Hyperspace::Session(comm, props_ptr, new HyperspaceSessionHandler());
00146       if (!Global::hyperspace_ptr->wait_for_connection(30)) {
00147         HT_ERROR("Unable to connect to hyperspace, exiting...");
00148         exit(1);
00149       }
00150 
00151       Global::range_metadata_max_bytes = props_ptr->get_int64("Hypertable.RangeServer.Range.MetadataMaxBytes", 0LL);
00152 
00153       if (Global::verbose) {
00154         cout << "CPU count = " << System::get_processor_count() << endl;
00155         cout << "Hypertable.RangeServer.Reactors=" << reactor_count << endl;
00156         if (Global::range_metadata_max_bytes != 0)
00157           cout << "Hypertable.RangeServer.Range.MetadataMaxBytes=" << Global::range_metadata_max_bytes << endl;
00158       }
00159 
00160       RangeServerPtr range_server_ptr = new RangeServer(props_ptr, conn_manager_ptr, app_queue_ptr, Global::hyperspace_ptr);
00161 
00162       if (pidfile != "") {
00163         fstream filestr (pidfile.c_str(), fstream::out);
00164         filestr << getpid() << endl;
00165         filestr.close();
00166       }
00167 
00168       // install maintenance timer
00169       timer_handler_ptr = new TimerHandler(comm, range_server_ptr.get());
00170 
00171       app_queue_ptr->join();
00172 
00173       Global::metadata_table_ptr = 0;
00174 
00175       ReactorFactory::destroy();
00176 
00177       HT_ERROR("Exiting RangeServer.");
00178 
00179     }
00180     catch (Exception &e) {
00181       HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00182     }
00183   }
00184   exit(1);
00185 }
